backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functions defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a phone-number replacement change across two frontend components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing pre-generated summaries of all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template with metadata and script entry point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling the site header, sections, footer, and floating WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/components/FloatingWhatsApp: Floating button that opens the PhoneNumberSelector dialog for WhatsApp actions.
frontend/src/components/PhoneNumberSelec: Dialog component letting users choose between two phone numbers for calling or WhatsApp messaging.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section showing company overview and four feature cards with icons.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders a contact form with validation, WhatsApp message building, and success feedback using a phone number selector.
frontend/src/components/sections/HomeHer: Displays the homepage hero section with call, WhatsApp, and location actions using a phone number selector.
frontend/src/components/sections/OurWork: File is empty or contains no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Shows a list of services with icons and provides CTA buttons for quotes and WhatsApp contact using a selector.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Provides reasons to choose the company and includes call and WhatsApp buttons backed by a phone number selector.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer displaying company description, copyright, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with navigation, call button opening PhoneNumberSelector, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, autoâ€‘refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context handling login, logout, identity loading, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are required for the static site.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, custom OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark themes, and base element styles including font and scrolling behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles and rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/scrollToSection.ts: Provides a smooth-scrolling helper that scrolls to an element with header offset and resolves when the element becomes visible.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with plugins, custom color tokens mapped to CSS variables, container settings, and extended theme values.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing and new feature requests, and state versioning for build planning.
